name: Extremly Realistic Time Jumps
description:
Extremly short Story
You are a timetraveller lost in time and space. Your mission is to find your way back home.

Extremly Instructions (how to play)
Jump:

  1. Hold "jump"-Button to charge jump-power. (green - red)
  2. Aim with the indicator for the perfect jump-angle.
  3. Release "jump"-Button for extreme jump-takeoff.

Timeskill: Hold "timeskill"-Button to rewind time.

Run: Hold "run"-Button to move with increased speed.

Extremly easy Controls
Keyboard:

R - timeskill
SHIFT - run
SPACE - jump
WASD - move
MOUSE - camera

Gamepad(Recommended):

X - timeskill
B - run
A - jump
LEFT STICK - move
RIGHT STICK - camera

Credits
3D-Models and textures partly used from Unitys Free Asset-Store. The other part was created by yeff and drobel.
Used Sounds: Freesounds.org
Used Software: Unity, Krita, Blender, FL-Studio

This game was made for the GameDev.tv Community jam. The Theme was "Time".

The Download-Version is Recommended for a better Performance.
